trends: There has been one other sighting in Hobe Sound
There were no other sightings in Hobe Sound on or around February 8th 2010
Summary: Two Slow Moving White Stars in the Morning Sunlight
divs: sighting detailsi woke up this morning and went down stairs for a cigarette and coffee out on the back porch, here in hobe sound, today, 2\8\2010 at 9:50 am. i then looked west and looked up at an airplane and noticed there was a white balloon floating behind it. as the airplane moved on the white object moved much slower. i then noticed another white object and went to get my binoculars inside. when i came out they were still there and as i looked at them through the binoculars they got brighter from the sunlight. there then appeared a red\orange object between them that i could not see with the naked eye. my mother came out and asked what i was looking at and i pointed them out and she noticed them and went to work. there was a shuttle launch this morning and i wondered if that had anything to do with it. i looked back up and the trailing white round thing went back in the direction it came from (ne), and then i followed it through the binoculars. when i looked away and went back to find it, it was gone. i tried through the binoculars, but i could not find it. i then went on the computer to look for anybody else who witnessed this and there was nothing.
